PHRASE.LANG: When she's not putting on her "Louboutins," she's putting on these. [#Legal]
Quand elle ne porte pas ses talons de grand couturier, la Reine enfile ces sandales. [#Legal]
Wenn sie ihre Stöckelschuhe nicht findet, zieht sie diese schicken Treter an. [#Legal]
Quando non indossa le sue "Louboutin", indossa queste. [#Legal]
Cuando no lleva los tacones de aguja, se pone estos. [#Legal]
When she's not putting on her "Louboutins," she's putting on these. [#Legal]
킬힐을 신고 있지 않을 때는 이런 편안한 샌들도 괜찮습니다. [#Legal]
When she's not putting on her "Louboutins," she's putting on these. [#Legal]
皇后不穿名牌高跟鞋時，就是穿這對涼鞋。[#Legal]
